scripts.clean: npm run rm-package-lock && npm run rm-node_modules
scripts.start: npm run rm-build && npm run build:dll && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack serve --env env=dev federation
scripts.start-bundleanalyzer: npm run rm-build && npm run build:dll && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack serve --env env=dev federation bundleAnalyzer
scripts.build:dev: npm run rm-build && npm run build:dll && npm run build-w-rm:dev
scripts.build-bundleanalyzer-w-rm:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --env env=dev federation bundleAnalyzer
scripts.build-bundleanalyzer:dev: npm run rm-build && npm run build:dll && npm run build-bundleanalyzer-w-rm:dev
scripts.build-w-rm: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging webpack --env env=prod staging federation
scripts.build: npm run rm-build && npm run build:dll && npm run build-w-rm
scripts.build-bundleanalyzer-w-rm: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging webpack --env env=prod staging federation bundleAnalyzer
scripts.build-bundleanalyzer: npm run rm-build && npm run build:dll && npm run build-bundleanalyzer-w-rm
scripts.build-w-rm:beta: cross-env NODE_ENV=beta webpack --env env=prod beta federation
scripts.build:beta: npm run rm-build && npm run build:dll && npm run build-w-rm:beta
scripts.build-bundleanalyzer-w-rm:beta: cross-env NODE_ENV=beta webpack --env env=prod beta federation bundleAnalyzer
scripts.build-bundleanalyzer:beta: npm run rm-build && npm run build:dll && npm run build-bundleanalyzer-w-rm:beta
scripts.build-w-rm:beta-stg: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging webpack --env env=prod beta federation
scripts.build:beta-stg: npm run rm-build && npm run build:dll && npm run build-w-rm:beta-stg
scripts.build-bundleanalyzer-w-rm:beta-stg: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging webpack --env env=prod beta federation bundleAnalyzer
scripts.build-bundleanalyzer:beta-stg: npm run rm-build && npm run build:dll && npm run build-bundleanalyzer-w-rm:beta-stg
scripts.build-w-rm:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --env env=prod release federation
scripts.build:prod: npm run rm-build && npm run build:dll && npm run build-w-rm:prod
scripts.build-bundleanalyzer-w-rm:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --env env=prod release federation bundleAnalyzer
scripts.build-bundleanalyzer:prod: npm run rm-build && npm run build:dll && npm run build-bundleanalyzer-w-rm:prod
scripts.build-w-rm:prod-stg: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging webpack --env env=prod release federation
scripts.build:prod-stg: npm run rm-build && npm run build:dll && npm run build-w-rm:prod-stg
scripts.build-bundleanalyzer-w-rm:prod-stg: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging webpack --env env=prod release federation bundleAnalyzer
scripts.build-bundleanalyzer:prod-stg: npm run rm-build && npm run build:dll && npm run build-bundleanalyzer-w-rm:prod-stg
scripts.lint: npm run lint-js && npm run lint-css && npm run prettier -- --check .
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint-js:fix && npm run lint-css:fix && npm run prettier:fix -- .
